name.baseName: Raw material melting ; Glass insulated jar liner ; Quartz sand, soda ash, calcite, etc. ; Combustion producer gas pool kiln ; All sizes; NESPS2
原料熔制 ; 玻璃保温瓶胆 ; 石英砂、纯碱、方解石等 ; 燃发生炉煤气池窑 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 本工艺涉及石英砂、纯碱和方解石等原材料的熔化，以制作玻璃保温瓶胆。所使用的燃料为发生炉煤气池窑，适用于各种规模的生产。所生产的瓶胆主要用于需要保持温度的保温容器中。集成了污染控制技术，包括对颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）的袋式过滤器，效率为99%，对氮氧化物的选择性催化还原（SCR），效率为85%，对二氧化硫的熟石灰喷雾半干法，效率为65%，以及对化学需氧量的沉淀分离，效率为35%。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码30,三级代码305.0,四级代码3056文件，在完整版文件中第767页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数（小时/年）/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为玻璃保温瓶胆，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisSCR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是选择性催化还原法（SCR），其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数（小时/年）/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)
污染物指标废水量的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisOthers (slaked lime spray semi-dry method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是其他（消石灰喷雾半干法），其效率为65，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数（小时/年）/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPrecipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management35，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是沉淀分离，其效率为35，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数（小时/年）/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)
污染物指标废气量的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
